page.title: 05MEON ELECTRICAL CONTRACTS
page.content: By the very title of the Company it is clear that we carry out a very varied service to the community conveying from General Domestic Repairs,such as kettles,irons,toasters,heaters,light and plugs etc.,up to repairs and installations for farmers who carry a vast amount of electrical equipment,and seem to be the most vulnerable to breakdowns in the early hours of the morning at the start of milking,and of course there is usually a panic of some kind when it comes to harvesting time.Also there are a number of factories both large and small in a 5 mile radius of the village,giving employment to the community in one form or another.
